mapper.insert: insert into man_system_log (billid, operateid, content, operate_date, type) values (#{billid}, #{operateid}, #{content}, #{operate_date}, #{type})
mapper.select: select billid, operateid, content, date_format(operate_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as operate_date, type from man_system_log order by operate_date desc
select billid, operateid, content, date_format(operate_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as operate_date, type from man_system_log where type = #{type} order by operate_date desc
